'''Special Programs''' (SP) are broadcasts that announce the content of an upcoming [[version]] of ''[[Genshin Impact]]''. They can take the form of:
* YouTube premieres, which are published to [https://www.youtube.com/c/genshinimpact ''Genshin Impact''{{'}}s official YouTube channel] on a specific date
* Twitch live streams, which are prerecorded then broadcast to [https://twitch.tv/genshinimpactofficial ''Genshin Impact''{{'}}s Twitch channel]
* Bilibili live streams, which are broadcast to [https://space.bilibili.com/401742377/ ''Genshin Impact''{{'}}s official Bilibili channel]
